"The Rescue"

Epic Adventures: Chapter 1 


The Rescue depicts this crazy scene where a young robot is seen reuniting with the elderly on the planet of CYBEROID with the help of Captain Tim who's on his journey to find his purpose. After his planet BÂªYC/1 was destroyed by their enemies.

Let's see what the future holds for our Captain. And witness the most EPIC tales of the century!!
